name: commander-v
description: Concatenates and formats multiple files together with an optional ASCII tree view of your project. Delivered swiftly to your clipboard in just a click.

commanderV.asciiTreePrepend.title: Include ASCII Tree
commanderV.asciiTreePrepend.description: Prepend an ASCII tree of your project's directory structure to the clipboard payload. Helpful to both humans and AIs needing to understand your project's structure.

commanderV.asciiTreeMaxDepth.title: Maximum Tree Depth
commanderV.asciiTreeMaxDepth.description: The maximum depth of directories to include in the generated ASCII tree. Only applies when "Prune Tree to Included Files" is disabled.

commanderV.asciiTreePrune.title: Prune Tree to Included Files
commanderV.asciiTreePrune.description: If enabled, the generated tree will be limited to the files being concatenated.

commanderV.ignoreFile.title: Ignore File
commanderV.ignoreFile.description: Path to your ignore file, containing patterns to exclude from the generated ASCII tree. The ignore file is not applied when "Prune Tree to Included Files" is enabled.

commanderV.prependFileComment.description: The opening comment shown at the beginning of every file. Use $path as a placeholder for the file path.
commanderV.prependFileComment.title: Begin File Comment

commanderV.appendFileComment.title: End File Comment
commanderV.appendFileComment.description: The closing comment shown at the end of every file. Use $path as a placeholder for the file path.

commanderV.playDoneSound.title: Success Chime
commanderV.playDoneSound.description: Play a sound when operations are successful and output is delivered to you clipboard.
